column5: I know it's a bit early but we would like to add one person to our group of 5 for our trip to north caribou lake next summer. Dates are June 26 to July 5 2019, cost is about $1600US (includes 9 days and HST). you can see my recent trip report at: https://www.walleyecentral.com/forum...=north+caribou please send me a PM if interested or if you would like additional details. phish

Don't mean to rain on your parade but I just finished reading a Mike Borger report on his trip to North Caribou in 2017. You are definitely on the right lake, maybe the wrong area. I will say your cost for the trip seems really reasonable. Get back to me in a couple of months if you haven't found somebody. I might be talked into it.

I believe Mike is at North Caribou with his son as we type. Must be something to that place. If you decide to go, make sure the plane is big enough to fly in that new boat of yours !!!! Wait, do they even allow glass boats in Canada? PjShorthorn
